ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Subject: RE: Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: i m sorry!  i definitely remember the dwarf chops, but not the gnomes. perhaps it is because only recently i have become ANTI-GNOME, and now want to eat them.
ygData.messageBody:
i'm sorry! i definitely remember the dwarf chops, but not the gnomes.
perhaps it is because only recently i have become ANTI-GNOME, and now want
to eat them. any gnome kabobs or other gnomish-type delicacies you can make
i will gladly purchase! lots and lots, i want to feed the entire Powa clan
full of gnomes.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> Shada!
> I have made you gnome Kabobs before, and Dwarf Chops.(And
> gnome cookies)
> Memory acting up in yer old age?
>
> -Martyn
